sentences.en: At the end of the row, bind off seven stitches.
sentences.cn: 最后一行要收七针.

sentences.en: Bind the ends of the cord together with thread.
sentences.cn: 把细绳的两端用线系在一起。

sentences.en: Bind the mixture with the raw minced liver and cook for 3 minutes more.
sentences.cn: 让混合物滚上切碎的生肝脏，烹饪3分钟以上。

sentences.en: He wants a shirt that does not bind him.
sentences.cn: 他要一件不使他觉得过紧的衬衫.

sentences.en: he was bound over to keep the peace by magistrates.
sentences.cn: 治安官命他具结保证不扰乱治安。

sentences.en: He whipped out a handkerchief to bind up his finger.
sentences.cn: 他迅速地抽出一块手帕来包扎手指.

sentences.en: I will let the waiter bind up the parcel for you.
sentences.cn: 我让服务生帮你把包裹包起来.

sentences.en: I'll advance you the money for it, here and now, just to help you out of a bind.
sentences.cn: 我现在就把钱预付给你，好让你摆脱困境。

sentences.en: It is expensive to buy and a bind to carry home.
sentences.cn: 买这个费用很贵，搬回家也费劲。

sentences.en: It used to be usual to bind out promising boys for many years.
sentences.cn: 过去,人们经常让有出息的男孩子拜师学艺好多年.

sentences.en: It will loose if you don't bind it fast.
sentences.cn: 你不把它系紧它会松的.

sentences.en: Please bind fast; it is loosing.
sentences.cn: 绑紧点, 它要松了.

sentences.en: She bound up his wounds.
sentences.cn: 她把他的伤口包扎好。

sentences.en: The firm has agreed to bind up the six articles into one book.
sentences.cn: 公司已经同意把那六篇文章汇编成一本书.

sentences.en: The flour mixture isn’t wet enough to bind properly.
sentences.cn: 这面粉混合料没加够水，所以团不起来。

sentences.en: The monks are bound by vows of silence.
sentences.cn: 僧侣们必须遵守保持缄默的誓言。

sentences.en: These compounds bind with genetic material in the liver.
sentences.cn: 这些化合物在肝脏中与遗传物质实现结合。

sentences.en: These may bind to receptor molecules on the surfaces of cells.
sentences.cn: 这些可能会在细胞表面和受体分子结合在一起。

sentences.en: They bind over to tell the truth.
sentences.cn: 他们发誓会说真话.

sentences.en: They bound my arms and legs with rope.
sentences.cn: 他们用绳子绑住我的手臂和腿。

sentences.en: This imposes a duty on courts to bind over parents when they have no control over their children.
sentences.cn: 这就使法庭有义务在无权控制孩子的时候命令其父母具结保证。

sentences.en: two volumes bound in leather
sentences.cn: 两卷皮面装帧的书
